<html><head></head><body bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift nods.</div><div><br></div><div>" Removing it would probably be a better idea.  Let's see what Elder has for us as far as advice is concerned."<br><br>Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital media.  <div><br></div><div>I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  </div><div><br></div><div>Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this address and we will talk.  </div></div><div><br>On Mar 7, 2012, at 3:55 PM, "C" <<a href="mailto:airly2002@...">airly2002@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type="cite"><div>

Perceptor:<br>
<br>
"If you like to protect your precious proto-humans"said Perceptor"We should insolate the area or maybe remove it"<br>
